author: cgreenwood
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Emotional scenes as Michelle Connor scatter baby Ruairi’s ashes on tonight’s episode as actress Kym Marsh talks how difficult and emotional she found filming the scenes
text:
TV Magazine HEARTBREAKING Coronation Street spoilers: Emotional scenes as Michelle Connor scatter baby Ruairi’s ashes on tonight’s episode as actress Kym Marsh talks how difficult and emotional she found filming the scenes 
Michelle and Steve scatter the ashes of their son Ruairi after he died after being born prematurely at just 23 weeks into her pregnancy Spoiler
